locations.name: Volcanoes National Park Area, Rwanda
locations.description: The primary base for mountain gorilla trekking in the Virunga Mountains, offering intimate wildlife encounters.

locations.name: Serengeti National Park, Tanzania
locations.description: Iconic safari destination known for its vast plains, the Great Migration (seasonal), and abundant wildlife including the Big Five.

locations.name: Stone Town, Zanzibar, Tanzania
locations.description: A UNESCO World Heritage site, the historic heart of Zanzibar City, known for its winding lanes, unique architecture, and vibrant markets.

locations.name: Zanzibar Beach Area, Tanzania
locations.description: Representative location for Zanzibar's coastal resorts (e.g., Nungwi/Kendwa in the north), offering pristine beaches, turquoise waters, snorkeling, and relaxation.
